pkgmetadata.longdescription: This package provides a module ``aafigure``, that can be used from otherprograms, and a command line tool ``aafigure``.Example, test.txt:: +-----+ ^ | | | --->+ +---o---> | | | +-----+ VCommand:: aafigure test.txt -t svg -o test.svgPlease see documentation for examples.http://aafigure.readthedocs.io/
